title: Dr. Ninja Baljeet
description: Aliens, zombies, and tough henchmen are no match for Dr. Ninja Baljeet.
quote: I did not go through six years of ninja school just to be called Dr. Baljeet. It is Dr. Ninja Baljeet, ok?
alt1: Dr. Baljeet caring for a woman on the beach
alt3: Dr. Baljeet hanging from a helicopter and holding onto a dangling woman
alt4: Dr. Baljeet and a blonde drive a speed boat away from a yacht
